name: Skill Tree Simulator 2000
description:
Ever wanted to gain skill points and choose your talents, but without all the silly story or combat of an RPG?

Skill Tree Simulator 2000 was born out of this want.

Meant to be a semi-idle game, combat happens automatically. You can build your character to be more active, or slow and steady so you can level up while you do other tasks.

This is my very 1st game(outside of classes). It was mostly meant as a learning tool, but I do plan on doing balance updates and perhaps some graphics updates over time.

Please report any bugs to ryringames.com or @ryringames on Twitter.
